dt: {bc}a slender tapering blade or stalk (as of grass)
{bc}the upper tapering part of something (such as a tree or antler) {bc}{sx|pinnacle||}
{bc}a tapering roof or analogous pyramidal construction surmounting a tower

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}spīr{/it}; akin to Middle Dutch {it}spier{/it} blade of grass
shortdef: a slender tapering blade or stalk (as of grass)
the upper tapering part of something (such as a tree or antler) : pinnacle
a tapering roof or analogous pyramidal construction surmounting a tower

dt: {bc}the inner or upper part of a {a_link|spiral} gastropod shell consisting of all the whorls except the whorl in contact with the body

et: Latin {it}spira{/it} coil, from Greek {it}speira{/it}; perhaps akin to Greek {it}sparton{/it} rope, esparto
shortdef: the inner or upper part of a spiral gastropod shell consisting of all the whorls except the whorl in contact with the body

dt: {bc}to rise in or as if in a {a_link|spiral}

shortdef: to rise in or as if in a spiral
